List.title: Everything I have been working on at Bitcoin Suisse has been quite exciting and interesting. I have gained a lot of new knowledge and new experiences. Before joining Bitcoin Suisse, my blockchain/cryptocurrency knowledge was pretty basic.
List.name: Afina Inana

List.title: Bitcoin Suisse appealed to me from day one with its high service orientation. From the very beginning, I was able to take on a lot of responsibility and various activities. In addition, clients always come first, which is something I really appreciate.
List.name: Lukas Schmid

List.title: Working for such a high growth firm, I was able to take on a lot of responsibility in different roles at a young age. Our jobs are demanding and we constantly need to learn and adapt to new things - all the time. But most evenings coming home from work, I feel happy and satisfied.
List.name: Fabian Hediger

List.title: It is a great honor to be working for such a dynami From day one I had the opportunity to support the fast scaling and growth of Bitcoin Suisse, take on a lot of responsibility, constantly learn and develop further. Providing client-oriented solutions is reflected in the unique culture and team spirit of Bitcoin Suisse.
List.name: Ceyda Majcen
